room_title: Escape room "Ghostbusters: Dimension VR" by The Void Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: This is the most fun thing you will ever do.  It's not virtual reality. It's hyper reality. It is amazing and life changing fur sure. You won't be disappointed

room_title: Escape room "Ghostbusters: Dimension VR" by The Void Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: This was so much fun. My husband and I did the ghostbusters one and had such a great time that we immediately did the Star Wars one. Will definitely do it again next time we are in town

room_title: Escape room "Ghostbusters: Dimension VR" by The Void Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: So so so good!! My husband did the Star Wars one 1st and he came out with his mind blown. It was his first experience with a VR game. We immediately booked the next game with Ghostbusters. OMG. It was incredible. I loved it. You must go. $35 for 20-30 min. Totally worth it.
